"widgetTree":[{"widget":"Text","widgetId":"48_3_5","props":{"name":"text1","caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Please treat tokens with respect and do NOT share them.\r\n\r\nNote: Local users don't have tokens as they don't login via SSO."],"friendlyId":"MendixSSO.TokenSecurityWarningSnippet.text1"}},"renderMode":"span","class":"mx-name-text1"}}]
